00014 void cScore::update() {
00015         static Uint32 dtime = 0;
00016         static Uint32 atime = SDL_GetTicks();
00017         
00018         
00019         if (score != target) {
00020                 // ((target - score) / abs(target - score)) = 1 if target > score, -1 if target < score
00021                 float increment = (float)speed * ((float)POINTS_PER_SECOND*((float)dtime/1000)) * (float)((target - score) / abs(target - score));
00022                 //cout << score << " " << target << " " << dtime << " " << speed << " " << (POINTS_PER_SECOND*((float)dtime/1000)) << "  " << increment << "\n";
00023                 if (increment > abs(target - score)) {
00024                         score = target;
00025                         speed = 0;
00026                 } else {
00027                         score += increment;
00028                 }
00029         }
00030         dtime = SDL_GetTicks() - atime;
00031         atime = SDL_GetTicks();
00032 }

00034 void cScore::reset(){score = 0;}
00035 void cScore::add(long amount){target += amount; speed++;}
00036 void cScore::subtract(long amount){target -= amount; speed++;}
00037 unsigned long cScore::get(){return score;}

00040 void cScore::operator-=(long rhs){subtract(rhs);}
00041 bool cScore::operator< (long rhs){return (target < rhs);}
00042 void cScore::operator= (long rhs){target = rhs;}
